Washoe was raised in an environment

rapport
initially they took a traditional

this firstly the simple action reward

really understand the words she was
signing same way parents saying I love

why sure would break into a laughing fit

over so the researchers abandoned this
and instead just let her learn through
observation of her caretaker signing
with much better results even in the

only downside was that the job title of
